changelog.changes:
* Various bugfixes and update for GeckoView engine
* Localization updates
* It was decided to leave support for WebView engine and recommend it for weaker devices

* Engine changing: GeckoView implementation added
* Home page design updated
* Startpage added to default search engines list (thanks to felfert)

* Popup blocking re-implemented (thank you WIStudent for implementation ideas and MR)
* More options and fix for link context menu (thank you MailYouLater for string-case fix)
* Several other small bugs fixed
* Translations updated

* Some crashes fixed
* Do not log temporary history in incognito mode (even temporary)
* Trick to make play/pause remote media button work (experimental)
* Fixed one problem of not opening magnet links on Android 11 and below
* Fixed downloading in private folder problem on Android 12
* Dropped support of Android 5.x
